metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22114 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component: InnoDB). Supported versions that are affected are 8.0.34 and prior and 8.1.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized ability to cause a hang or frequently repeatable crash (complete DOS) of MySQL Server. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Availability impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:N/A:H).

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Jie Liang, Jingzhou Fu, and Zhiyong Wu

notes.Note: leosilva> since 5.5 is no longer upstream supported and so far we cannot patch it, marking it as ignored.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.1 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
